output_list.description: mintToken function allows arbitrary increase of token supply, aka the 'token Devalue' issue.
freezeAccount function allows owner to freeze accounts, allowing asset theft.
setPrices function allows owner to set sell and buy price, allowing arbitrage.
buy function allows buyPrice to be set arbitrarily, allowing attackers to manipulate the price.
sell function allows sellPrice to be set arbitrarily, allowing attackers to manipulate the price.
